EmailTemplate.name: Retail Bottle & Lowball
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for reaching out to YETI! We have big plans for exciting new products in the wildly successful series of our Rambler drinkware line, and we look forward to sharing those plans with you soon.
We’d love to talk to you about our Rambler Bottles and Lowballs along with why we’re excited about them and this change. Please reach out to us Monday – Friday from 7:00 am – 6:00 pm CT at 512-394-9384.
Thanks!
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
